1:
We give thanks to you;\q2 our God, we thank you.
\q1 You are close to us,
\q2 and we proclaim to others the wonderful things that you have done for us.
\q1
2:
You have said, "I have appointed a time when I will judge people,\q2 and I will judge everyone fairly.
\q1
3:
When the earth shakes\q2 and all the creatures on the earth tremble,
\q1 I am the one who will keep its foundations steady.



\q1
4:
I say to people who boast, 'Stop bragging!'\q1 and I say to wicked people, 'Do not proudly do things to show how great you are!'"
\q
5:
Do not be arrogant,\q2 and do not speak so boastfully!
\q1
6:
The one who judges people does not come from the east or from the west,\q1 and he does not come from the desert.


\q1
7:
God is the one who judges people;\q2 he shames and punishes some, and he honors others.
\q1
9:
But as for me, I will never stop saying what the God whom Jacob worshiped has done;\q1 I will never stop singing to praise him.
\q1
10: He promises this: "I will destroy the power of wicked people,\q1 but I will increase the power of righteous people."
